data.name: Great Paintings VR - Donation
data.detailed_description:
Great Paintings VR is a 100% FREE. It will always be free. It does not require you to buy this DLC or anything else in order to enjoy the application. If you download the base application, you get all of the content it has to offer.

This DLC is here to serve Great Paintings VR in two ways:
  • Provide a way for people to show their generosity and support for the development of this project. I am doing this as a fun hobby and am happy to fund the development cost of Great Paintings VR myself. All donations go back into the development of new features or marketing of Great Paintings VR so that more people can enjoy a large free virtual museum.
  • Participate in Steam sales. Steam sales are the main way games get exposure on the platform and can be promoted.

A text will appear on the main menu to indicate that you have the donation pack installed.

data.short_description: Donation pack to support the developer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-7500 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-7500 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: There are paintings having violent images, and naked people.
